location.$comment: Defines the area that this tour will be available within

lat.$comment: Latitude of the central point of the tour area

lon.$comment: Longitude of the central point of the tour area

radius.$comment: Radius (in meters) around the central point defining the extent of the tour area

points.$comment: The points of interest to show on the tour along with a descriptor. These will be shown in the order of the array.

id.$comment: Unique identifier for the point of interest

additional_info.$comment: Additional descriptive information about the point of interest

metadata.$comment: All the metadata about the tour.

author.$comment: Author or creator of the tour

images.$comment: Any images used to augment the display of the tour preview, such as an icon or a small gallery of images. Images are categorized by their purpose.

purpose.$comment: Purpose of the image: ICON for icon images, GALLERY for gallery images, DESCRIPTION for descriptive images
